column16:
'desc': [u'

Chicco Brush and Comb (Light Blue) Price: Rs.349

The delicate curls of your baby girl need to be nurtured and combed in an appropriate manner for them to look pretty and bouncy all the time. The Brush and Comb from Chicco are specially designed keeping in mind the soft and delicate hair of little girls belonging to the age group of 0 to 3 months.

This Chicco Brush and Comb pack ensures Safe Hygiene for your baby girl and provides daily massage to her scalp. The Soft Brush is naturally made out of Goat Hair and thus has bristles that gently soothe the scalp. The Rounded Ends of the Comb make sure that your sweetheart does not get physically wounded in any manner because of its usage. Both the Brush and the Comb from Chicco are made to have Large Handles
column17: ensuring an Easy and Safe Grip for the mother as she combs and styles her baby\u2019s hair. Simple and easy to use
column18:
this Chicco Brush and Comb Pack can be fit easily in your handbag or purse and can be used frequently on a daily basis.

\n
\n ']
